entry.title: Protocol-Level Pruning
entry.summary: It seems that the person speaking is not sure if the recipient has looked at previous UTXO set commitment proposals. They provide some bookmarks related to UTXO set commitments and TXO bitfields, delayed TXO commitments, TXO commitments not needing a soft-fork to be useful, and rolling UTXO set hashes. They also mention that there are many other resources available, including source code proposals. The speaker introduces themselves as Bryan and provides their website and phone number.
